subject: Video Recordings, Downloads and Streaming
Blacks
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Discrimination
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Donald Sterling made an agreement with the N.B.A. to “resolve all their differences” and gave his consent to a deal negotiated by his wife to sell the team that they co-own, Sterling’s lawyer said.
snippet: Donald Sterling made an agreement with the N.B.A. to “resolve all their differences” and gave his consent to a deal negotiated by his wife to sell the team that they co-own, Sterling’s lawyer said.
